ComicInfo.Summary:
G.I. JOE IS BACK! In the wake of IDW’s Revolution crossover event, G.I. JOE’s mission has become a global one–they aren’t just Real American Heroes, they’re Real Earth Heroes. Get ready for an explosive, innovative take on Joe, as writer Aubrey Sitterson (Street Fighter x G.I. Joe) and artist Giannis Milonogiannis (Prophet, Old City Blues) bring you the crown jewel of the Hasbro Universe: lasers, intense sci-fi action, and the return of Scarlett, Roadblock, Snake Eyes and more!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Ariel Olivetti | 1-2 | Sub-A | Subscription Cover A | Aaron Conley (a) & Jean-Francois Beaulieu (c) | 3 | Sub-B | Subscription Cover B | Andrew Griffith (a) & Josh Perez (c) | 4 | Sub-C | Subscription Cover C | None | 5 | RI-A | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Cover A | Sara Pitre-Durocher | 6 | RI-B | 1:25 Retailer Incentive Cover B | Sonny Liew | 7 | RI-C | 1:50 Retailer Incentive Cover C (Homage) | Paul Pope (a) & Lovern Kindzierski (c) | 8 | RE | Unknown Retailer Exclusive Cover | Jae Lee | 9-11 | RE | Vegas Comics/Planet Awesome Collectibles Exclusive Variant Cover (Homage) | Marat Mychaels (a) & Juan Nunez (c) | 12 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-10 16:00:14. [CVDB571525]
